author: peter_firmstone
msg: River-340 Significant refactoring of PolicyEntry which will be removed soon, replaced by Seven new classes, which appear to the client simply as PermissionGrantBuilder and PermissionGrant.  The PermissionGrant implementation returned is decided by the Builder, based on the desired behaviour.  Policy based revoking of ClassLoader grants will also be removed soon as this is Indeterminate.
